channel.title: Azazaya
channel.description: Personal Website of Kazi Abu Rousan

item.title: Introduction to Monte Carlo Integration
item.description: A brief discussion on Introduction to Monte Carlo Integration. Here we will see how to perform this in julia language and also it's theory.

item.title: Fast and Curious
item.description: A blog on comparing speed of different languages.

item.title: Playing with Tupper's Formula in Julia
item.description: A brief intro to Tupper's Formula with Julia. Here we will see how to perform this in julia language.

item.title: Introduction to Monte Carlo Integration
item.description: A brief discussion on Introduction to Monte Carlo Integration. Here we will see how to perform this in julia language and also it's theory.

item.title: Reciprocals of Primes
item.description: A brief discussion on the fact that taking the reciprocals of primes will generate numbers which repeat after certain digits. Here we will understand why this happens and will write a code to find out the period.

item.title: Mathematics Blog
item.description: A short description of the page which would serve as blurb in a RSS feed; you can use basic markdown here but the whole description string must be a single line (not a multiline string). Like this one for instance. Keep in mind that styling is minimal in RSS so for instance don't expect maths or fancy styling to work; images should be ok though:
